thread.section_title: Animal Rights Petitions. End Cruelty and Exploitation
thread.title: Demand an End to the Donkey slaughter in South Africa NOW !!!
thread.title_full: Demand an End to the Donkey slaughter in South Africa NOW !!!

title: Demand an End to the Donkey slaughter in South Africa NOW !!!
text:
by: Claudia B target: donky traders 
This quite loving peaceful, useful animal faces distinction ...all they have ever done is help humans make a living by being the cheapest of transport for humans and all they ever asked is food and water and they save and make us money...now because people think their hide's gelatin has a curing and medicinal purposes (which is NOT true) they are going to build donkey abattoirs in South Africa to help the poor communities to live better ??? For how long then the donkey is extinct and what would be next then ??? They are more use to the people alive PLEASE HELP me stop this trade ....did Jesus not ride on a donkey's back ? Is nothing sacred anymore ? This is my first petition if I am going about it wrong please advise me but I really want to stop or regulate this trade because it is very cruel to me humans destroy everything good ....let us STOP this PLEASE ....I beg you !!!
